item.title: Unknowing Believers
item.description: I’ll let you in on a little secret. You ready? I’m not a “big tent” guy. To me, “big tent” means we’ll keep adding on beliefs (or abandoning them) until no one disagrees with us. In other words, **“big tent” means pretending to enjoy the beatings we’re given. ** “Big tent” is Republican for “surrender.” It’s not for me. What is for me is broadening and building the base. Let me explain.
